page.title: 05Names at Barnfields School.
page.content: At Barnfields Primary School, out of a population of 386 children we found that Andrew and Claire are the most popular christian names. The second most popular are Mark and Nicola. Andrew and Claire were chosen mainly because parents just liked them but in one case Andrew was chosen as it was in the Bible and Claire because the mother liked the song 'Claire' by Gilbert O'Sullivan and she had the same initial as her brother. Of the children born in 1979-80 the most popular names are Lisa, Andrew, Jonathan and Mark. In 1973-74 the most popular again are Claire and Andrew.
